body_html: (other differences have been factored out and are controlled elsewhere; for example, the AttentionWrapper object has an argument output_attention; the Luong and Bahdanau papers used different versions of this. but from an API perspective, it's better to keep it configurable elsewhere).
body_text: (other differences have been factored out and are controlled elsewhere; for example, the AttentionWrapper object has an argument output_attention; the Luong and Bahdanau papers used different versions of this.  but from an API perspective, it's better to keep it configurable elsewhere).
body: (other differences have been factored out and are controlled elsewhere; for example, the AttentionWrapper object has an argument `output_attention`; the Luong and Bahdanau papers used different versions of this.  but from an API perspective, it's better to keep it configurable elsewhere).
